# bds-theme-provider

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                          | Type                                   | Default   |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `theme`  | `theme`   | Set what theme will be aplyed inside the component. 'light', 'dark'; | `"dark" \| "high-contrast" \| "light"` | `'light'` |
